entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
